flawed_nl_solution:
He had B - 12 books after the history section.
He had B - 12 - 19 = B - {ERROR} books after the fiction section.
He had B - {ERROR} - 8 + 4 = B - 35 books after the children’s section.
He still had B - 35 = 61 books to shelve.
Thus, he started with B = 61 + 35 = <<61+35=96>>96 books in the cart.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 16, not 61. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
